markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Empathic Calm](/Feats.aspx?ID=3970) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Kashrishi" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=462" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Impossible Lands](/Sources.aspx?ID=146) pg. 44

</column>

---

Once per day, you can cast either [_calm emotions_](/Spells.aspx?ID=31) or [_sanctuary_](/Spells.aspx?ID=266) as an innate occult spell, heightened to half your level rounded up.
name: Empathic Calm
